text: Samuel Pierpoint Langley's Aerodrome No. 5 made the first successful flight of an unpiloted, engine-driven, heavier-than-air craft of substantial size.
The EDSAC, the first practical stored program computer, performed its first calculation. It operated at a speed of 714 operations per second.

Apple's Steve Jobs previewed Mac OS X 10.2 Jaguar during his Worldwide Developers Conference keynote. It featured a handwriting technology dubbed Inkwell, an iChat instant messenger client, QuickTime 6 integration and more.
Eve Online launched. The massively multiplayer space adventure differed from others in that its storylines were created mostly by the players of the game.
